game.name: Mini Skate
game.description:
Do you want to become a skater of your town? Have you ever dreamt of skating like a pro? Join Mini Skate game and get a pleasure of wearing the crown of the biggest skater of your city! You can even try out this brand new adventure challenge if you are a newbie to the online gaming industry. This cool html5 free online sports game is for everyone irrespective of his or her age or gender. Get ready to put your quick reflexes and jumping abilities to test to win!
You as a skater in this latest skating game will have to perform multiple stunts to clear all difficult levels. At initial stages, difficulties are very easy to deal with, but they become a little bit complicated as you progress in the game. Your objective is to avoid all the obstacles that you see on your path to clear each of the 10 levels. You would have 3 lives, so be careful while using them wisely and become a champion of skating. 
Be prepared to dodge cranes, walls and trash cans by either jumping or stopping on board! Try to save at least one of your lives to complete multiple levels to unlock new achievements! Make your character jump using the up arrow key or stop using the left arrow key. You can also use the touch controls to complete this task in this point and click game. Check out more sports games for boys on atmegame.com and enjoy an opportunity to have fun online for free, no download required!
